tweets.text:
When your home is flooded, the whole family is affected. To help children understand the risk of flooding and what to do if there's a flood, check out our new Kids' Space featuring games and videos created by @LancasterUni: https://t.co/9Jw9tM3LfK
@JBAConsulting @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/9L7XEFyidi

urls.title: Buy a rod fishing licence
urls.description: How and where to buy or upgrade a rod fishing licence for salmon, trout, freshwater fish, smelt and eels in England and Wales.

tweets.text: Checking rod licences today in Yorkshire.   Lots of patrols planned for Easter.  Many more people are enjoying fishing in lockdown - but you do need a licence!!!  Let the fish get caught not you!    https://t.co/AxbL51Heav.    @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/Ng6MmxiT3a

urls.title: Why Earth Hour matters now more than ever
urls.description: Van Griffiths, Deputy Director for Sustainable Business within the Environment Agency, explains how Earth Hour shines a light on the climate and nature crises.

tweets.text:
This is our opportunity to work together, to set the post-pandemic course for the benefit of our planet, people and nature everywhere üåç

Join us today at 8:30pm for #EarthHour in a demonstration of unity and hope for nature: https://t.co/LJljDDfU9y

#TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/4mR9SQw1yF

tweets.text: The 9th Swift Community Set has gone to the @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia Iceni House in Ipswich. The team there have been encouraging #Swifts there for many years and have created nest sites in their eaves. An excellent opportunity to boost the declining Swift population here.

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
Today we've issued @RedIndustries2 with an enforcement notice outlining the improvement actions they need to take at #WalleysQuarry to comply with their environmental permit 
 
Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn
 
#Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/atVO15mcNu
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 1st time for everything I suppose

1/4 Good piece by @MailOnline @colin_gram on the #riverlea in #hackney after its floods smothered the area in plastic & sewage. Appalling @EnvAgency claims 'no evidence of sewage or harm to wildlife' - https://t.co/9RRWlQxXgx but most shame on @pow_rebecca etc ministers .... https://t.co/icXceihWqj

tweets.text: Two of us tackled a blockage full of rubbish in the River Crouch, Essex this morning. Large netting, hundreds of plastic bottles, worst of it now bagged up. @EnvAgency @EssexRiversHub @CanalRiverTrust @River_Care @BasildonCouncil @Essex_CC @WickfordWombles @Wickford_News https://t.co/NckwNZZmre

SOSSwifts are pleased to announce that Holbrook Primary School is the recipient of the 8th Swift Community Set; 6 nest boxes and a call system for all to enjoy. Pupils can decorate the boxes and will receive a #Swift talk to explain their plight. @SuffolkBirdGrp @suffolkwildlife
